zu.input.test.jpg:
ubekwa yini kulendawo yezihlakaniphi. Futhi kuba khona
isikhathi lapho omunye nomunye exoxa ngezigigaba ake wa-
hlangabezana nazo empilweni yakhe. Kuphoqelekile ukuthi
kube yizigigaba zobuhlakani bobugebengu. Kazi uVusi yena
uyothamunda ziphi? Isikhathi sokuklwejwa kombhalo owu-
phawu engalweni noma esifubeni sona uyosenzenjani?

Ngomuso oVusi bathathwa ngezinqola, basiwa ezindaweni
ezahlukahlukene lapho babeyosebenza khona. Phela ngenkathi
iJaji limgweba uVusi lalithe: "IMINYAKA EYISHUMI UYAKU-
SEBENZA KANZIMA EJELE."

UVusi wafika kahle ejele kusentwasahlobo. Umsebenzi
wangalesosikhathi muningi futhi udinga nezisebenzi ezithe
xaxa.

Abanini masimu banazo izisebenzi ezakhe epulazini kodwa
ngalesisikhathi umsebenzi uye ube ngaphezu kwamandla azo.
Njengoba lamasimu ondla umphakathi kuye kuthathwe labo
abehlulekayo ukuphilisana nawo ukuze basebenzele wona.

UVusi wayengawuthandi lomsebenzi, kodwa ephoqelekile
ukuba awenze. Phela lokho kusebenza kanzima kwakuyisije-
ziso sakhe sokukhipha umphefumulo. Ngakho-ke kwakufanele
ajeze ethanda noma engathandi.

Uma kugqilazwa iziboshwa emajele kusukwe kuqondiswa
izigwegwe kuzo. Umthetho usuke unikeza izephulamthetho
isifundo; ukuze zithi lapho seziphuma ejele zikwazi ukuphili-
sana kahle nomphakathi.

UMaRadebe wayengazi ukuthi naye uyoze akholiseke
kangako emzini kaMangethe. Kodwa-ke indlela asehlupheke
ngayo ngecala lendodana yabo, emphefumulweni nasenya-
meni, usehambela nezindawo ayengakaze acabange elubhada
olwakhe kuzo.

Olwanamhlanje uhambo lumbeka esimweni sokukhuluma
umlomo nomlomo nendodana yakhe osekuyisikhathi agcina
ukukhuluma nayo. Wayegcine ukukhuluma nayo ekuseni mhla
zingama 20 kuSeptemba. Ngaphambi kokuba yaziwe njengo-
mbulali, nangaphambi kokuba ibe yisiboshwa. Uhambisana
nomyeni wakhe kanye namadodakazi abo omathathu.

Ogqayinyanga basesangweni babalayela ihhovisi ababezo-
qala kulo ukuze bathole yonke imininingwane ephathelene
nokubonwa kukaVusi. Kulelo hhovisi banikezwa ipheshana
elalibagunyaza ukuba kulezozakhiwo kepha, ngaphansi kwe-
migomo ethile. Babenqunyelwe isikhathi sokuxoxa nalowo

33
